Text: If it lands on 1, you win. Anything else, we win.

It's over... All my hard work is for nothing if we
lose this pivotal match... Ohh, what did I do to
deserve this...?
Well, sounds like a "you" problem.
It must be real nice not having anything to lose!

Relax. We're going to win this round! I've got a good
feeling about this!
Yeah, sure. Good luck with that.
We're just about to see the results...! Ohh...?!
O-Ooooone?!

S-See?! I won! C'mon, hand over my 3,600 chips!
Eeeek! I'm amazing!

M-My apologies...but we're out of chips. We hadn't
anticipated this outcome...
Huh? Well, that's no fun.
Wh-What astonishing luck... Unbelievable...

Such luck is unheard of! Unless we're talking about
the natural luck of the royals...!
(Well, she does happen to be a princess...)

Heehee! That gives us two wins in a row! What would
you like to play next? If it's poker, I know how to play.

No, we've already won two games, so we're the winner.
But thanks for the transparency that you're just here
to gamble.

By the way, since we had to self-fund the money we
gambled with...you'll, of course, be paying us our
wins, correct?

Ack! Oh dear. I hadn't expected us to exceed the
event budget... What will I tell the boss?
Boss...? But aren't you the boss—

What a poor showing, King. I came here because you
told me an interesting match was taking place, but
all I see is you losing badly to a couple of girls.
B-Boss...!

Boss...? King, you're not the one running this
casino?
No, I'm second in command... Joker there is the boss.

That's right. King was originally a customer, but I
hired him and gave him a high position due to his
excellent management skills.

But that's beside the point. King, Dealer, how will you
rectify this loss? Wouldn't you say these expenses
are a little too steep for an event?
M-My apologies. Forgive me...

I'm not defending them, but I'm pretty sure these
people were just doing their jobs.

Oh? You can't say they were "doing their jobs" when
they failed to consider unexpected losses. They'll
have to take full responsibility.

What an arrogant-looking guy... Being in my position,
I don't want to overlook the misery of my people. I'd
have difficulty sleeping at night, especially knowing
I was to blame.

What're you going on about...? If you're attempting
to overturn the results of a game, we'll have to take
appropriate action.

The guards who had been waiting in the wings surround
Beta and Alexia.

Fine! You already killed my winner's high by treating
me like I did something wrong! I'm pissed! I'll take on
all of you!

I was once a renowned warrior. I'm not averse to
settling this with force, but just know I won't go
easy on you!
Oh c'mon! We won! Why is this happening?!
Eeek! Sooo scary! I'm too young to die!

Hey, why are you hiding?! Where's all your bravado
from a moment ago?!

Waah...! I've never held anything heavier than a pen!
...So I'll leave the fighting to you!
Jeez, back me up, at least!
